body: Not a semantics change. `t.detach()` is the same as the Python version, but `t.TensorBase::detach()` meant "return the raw pointer, relinquishing ownership on it." It was very unsatisfactory, which is why I killed TensorBase::detach.
body_html: Not a semantics change. t.detach() is the same as the Python version, but t.TensorBase::detach() meant "return the raw pointer, relinquishing ownership on it." It was very unsatisfactory, which is why I killed TensorBase::detach.
